files.name: flights.csv
files.description: Contains information about flight trips, including origin, destination, price, agency, and other travel details.

columns.travelCode: Identifier for a travel package or itinerary.
columns.userCode: Identifier for the user who booked the flight (foreign key).
columns.from: The origin city and state of the flight.
columns.to: The destination city and state of the flight.
columns.flightType: The class of the flight (e.g., firstClass, economic).
columns.price: The cost of the flight ticket.
columns.time: The duration of the flight in hours.
columns.agency: The travel agency that handled the booking.

files.name: users.csv
files.description: Contains demographic and identifying information about users.

columns.company: The company associated with the user.
columns.name: The full name of the user.

files.name: hotels.csv
files.description: Contains information about hotel bookings, including location, duration, and cost.

columns.travelCode: Identifier for a travel package, linking to a broader trip.
columns.userCode: Identifier for the user who made the booking (foreign key).
columns.name: The name of the hotel.
columns.place: The city and state where the hotel is located.
columns.days: The number of days for the hotel stay.
columns.price: The price per day for the hotel stay.
columns.total: The total cost of the hotel stay.
columns.date: The check-in date for the hotel booking.
